item.Q:
Write the character:
to exceed; overtake; surpass; transcend; ultra-; super-; to pass; to cross
item.A:
chāo
超过 (超過) chāoguò to surpass; to exceed; to outstrip

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: side; edge; margin; border; boundary
2: suffix of a noun of locality
item.A:
traditional: 邊
1: biān 2: bian
一边 (一邊) yībiān one side; either side; on the one hand; on the other hand; doing while 外边 (外邊) wàibian (n) outside; (n) exterior surface; (n) place other than one's home town

耶 (strokes unavailable)
yē
耶和华 (耶和華) Yēhéhuá Jehovah

item.Q:
Write the character:
conduct; grade; thing; product; good
item.A:
pǐn
产品 (產品) chǎnpǐn goods; merchandise; product

shè
宿舍 sùshè dormitory; living quarters; hostel

虽 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 雖
suī
虽然 (雖然) suīrán although; even though

shǐ
开始 (開始) kāishǐ begin; beginning; start; initial

item.Q:
Write the character: chāo
(chāoguò de chāo)
item.A:
to exceed; overtake; surpass; transcend; ultra-; super-; to pass; to cross
超过 (超過) chāoguò to surpass; to exceed; to outstrip

item.Q:
Write the character: biān
(yībiān de biān)
item.A:
traditional: 邊
side; edge; margin; border; boundary
一边 (一邊) yībiān one side; either side; on the one hand; on the other hand; doing while

item.Q:
Write the character: bian
(wàibian de bian)
item.A:
traditional: 邊
suffix of a noun of locality
外边 (外邊) wàibian (n) outside; (n) exterior surface; (n) place other than one's home town

item.Q:
Write the character: yē
(Yēhéhuá de yē)
item.A:
耶 (strokes unavailable)
(phonetic ye)
耶和华 (耶和華) Yēhéhuá Jehovah

item.Q:
Write the character: pǐn
(chǎnpǐn de pǐn)
item.A:
conduct; grade; thing; product; good
产品 (產品) chǎnpǐn goods; merchandise; product

item.Q:
Write the character: shè
(sùshè de shè)
item.A:
residence
宿舍 sùshè dormitory; living quarters; hostel

item.Q:
Write the character: suī
(suīrán de suī)
item.A:
虽 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 雖
although; even though
虽然 (雖然) suīrán although; even though

item.Q:
Write the character: shǐ
(kāishǐ de shǐ)
item.A:
begin
开始 (開始) kāishǐ begin; beginning; start; initial

item.Q:
Write the character: yùn
(yùndòng de yùn)
item.A:
traditional: 運
to move; to transport; to use; to apply; fortune; luck; fate
运动 (運動) yùndòng movement; campaign; sports
chāorén Superman
chāochū to exceed; to overstep; to go too far; to encroach
chāozhī to overspend

traditional: 超級
chāojí transcending; high grade; super-; ultra-

traditional: 超級大國
chāojídàguó superpower
chāozìrán supernatural

traditional: 超過
chāoguò to surpass; to exceed; to outstrip
chāozhòng overweight (baggage, freight)
chāoyīnsù supersonic
gāochāo (adj) excellent

traditional: 一邊
yībiān one side; either side; on the one hand; on the other hand; doing while

traditional: 上邊
shàngbian upside

traditional: 下邊
xìabiān (n) under

traditional: 五邊形
wǔbiānxíng pentagon

traditional: 八邊形
bābiānxíng octagon

traditional: 前邊
qiánbiān (n) the area in front of sth

traditional: 北邊
běibiān (n) location to the north

traditional: 南邊
nánbiān (n) location to the south

traditional: 單邊
dānbiān unilateral

traditional: 四邊
sìbiān four sides

traditional: 四邊形
sìbiānxíng quadrilateral

traditional: 外邊
wàibian (n) outside; (n) exterior surface; (n) place other than one's home town

traditional: 多邊
duōbiān multilateral; polygon

traditional: 多邊形
duōbiānxíng polygon

traditional: 天邊
tiānbiān horizon; ends of the earth; remotest places

traditional: 平行四邊形
píngxíngsìbiānxíng parallelogram

traditional: 後邊
hòubiān back; rear; behind

traditional: 東邊
dōngbiān (n) eastern side

traditional: 正多邊形
zhèngduōbiānxíng isogon

traditional: 海邊
hǎibiān seaside

traditional: 無邊
wúbiān endlessness

traditional: 花邊
huābiān lace

traditional: 裡邊
lǐbiān inside

traditional: 西邊
xībiān (n) west side; to the west of

traditional: 身邊
shēnbiān at one's side

traditional: 這邊
zhèbiān this side; here

traditional: 邊區
biānqū border area

traditional: 邊地
biāndi border district
biāndì border district; borderland

traditional: 邊帶
biāndài sideband

traditional: 邊民
biānmín people living on the frontiers; inhabitants of a border area

traditional: 邊界
biānjiè boundary; border

traditional: 邊線
biānxiàn sideline; foul line

traditional: 邊遠
biānyuǎn far from the center; remote; outlying

traditional: 邊遠地區
biānyuǎndìqū far-away region

traditional: 那邊
nàbian yonder

traditional: 金邊
jīnbiān Phnom Penh (capital of Cambodia)

traditional: 耶和華
Yēhéhuá Jehovah
yēhéhuá Jehovah
dàiyòngpǐn substitute product
zuòpǐn works (of art)

traditional: 備品
bèipǐn machine parts or tools kept in reserve; spare parts
chūpǐn to produce an item; output; items that are produced
zhìchéngpǐn manufactured goods; finished product
pǐnmíng product name
pǐngé one's character; fret (on fingerboard of lute or guitar)

traditional: 品種
pǐnzhǒng breed; variety

traditional: 品級
pǐnjí workmanship
pǐnxíng behavior; moral conduct
xiǎopǐn short, simple literary or artistic creation; essay; skit

traditional: 工業品
gōngyèpǐn manufactured goods
bìxūpǐn necessity; essential (thing)
chéngpǐn finished goods; a finished product
rìyòngpǐn articles for daily use
guǒpǐn fruit

traditional: 樣品
yàngpǐn sample; specimen
cìpǐn substandard products; defective; seconds
wùpǐn articles; goods; materials
yòngpǐn articles for use; products; goods
xiàoshè school building

traditional: 雖然
suīrán although; even though

traditional: 雖說
suīshuō though; although
yuánshǐ first; original; primitive; original (document etc)
qǐshǐ originate

traditional: 開始
kāishǐ begin; beginning; start; initial

traditional: 五四運動
WǔsìYùndòng May Fourth Movement; Chinese national renewal movement that started with 4th May 1919 protest against the Treaty of Versailles

traditional: 學生運動
xuéshēngyùndòng student movement

traditional: 海運
hǎiyùn shipping by sea

traditional: 空運
kōngyùn air transport

traditional: 裝運
zhuāngyùn to load

traditional: 走運
zǒuyùn (v) be lucky

traditional: 轉運
zhuǎnyùn transportation; transfer

traditional: 運動
yùndòng movement; campaign; sports

traditional: 運動員

traditional: 運動場
yùndòngcháng playground
yùndòngchǎng sports field; playground; exercise yard

traditional: 運動會
yùndònghuì a sports competition

traditional: 運氣
yùnqi luck (good or bad)

traditional: 運球
yùnqiú dribble

traditional: 運用
yùnyòng to use; to put to use

traditional: 運算
yùnsuàn (mathematical) operation

traditional: 運行
yùnxíng be in motion; to move; to run

traditional: 運費
yùnfèi fare

traditional: 運轉

traditional: 運道
yùndào ascendant
